name: Sandworm Storm
description:
Berlin Mini Jam July 2015 Game

Code: https://github.com/vikpek/BerlinMiniJamJuly2015

We used the time at the jam to learn and get along with the Unreal Engine and testing out pipelines. The themes were:

- Sandworms

- Lightnings

- Tiny city

In our game you shoot sandworms in tiny Berlin with lightnings.

Team:

Jasmin Heinemann - Game Design

Richard Kubuszc - 3D Art (Sandworm in Maya)

Viktor Pekar - 3D Art (City in Blender)

Rezan Kizilgün - Code

Dennis Lieu - Code
